sourceMeaningMnemonic: You need to <radical>stop</radical> a <radical>drunkard</radical> from going down a <radical>slide</radical> with a <radical>jackhammer</radical> to ask him how many <kanji>years old</kanji> he is. He's doing a lot of dangerous things right now, and they all have age limits.
meaningInfo: Depending how many years old he is, this guy could be violating like three different laws right now.
readingMnemonic: When you ask him how many <kanji>years old</kanji> he is, he turns to you and screams, "I'M A MILLION YEARS OLD AND YOU'LL NEVER STOP ME!" That's obviously not how old this kid is, so you take out your holy blue <reading>sa</reading>ber (<ja>せい</ja>) and slice the slide in half. Then the jackhammer. Then the kid's metal arm—wait! This kid is a <reading>cy</reading>borg (<ja>さい</ja>)!
readingInfo: Your saber cuts through the cyborgs robo-body and it screams, "OKAY OKAY I'M NOT A MILLION I'M ONLY FIVE YEARS OLD AND A CYBORG PLEASE DON'T REPROGRAM ME!"
